item.title: Homepage
item.description: Hugo learn theme Hugo-theme-learn is a theme for Hugo, a fast and modern static website engine written in Go. Where Hugo is often used for blogs, this multilingual-ready theme is fully designed for documentation. This theme is a partial porting of the Learn theme of Grav, a modern flat-file CMS written in PHP. Main features Contribute to this documentation Feel free to update this content, just click the Edit this page link displayed on top right of each page, and pullrequest it
